resources.string: To place a condom order, please carefully input your dorm name, delivery type, and delivery details. Then click the button below!
Condoms will be placed under the specified room number door for Room deliveries and to a designated drop box in on your specified floor\'s lounge for Lounge deliveries.
Where do you want the condom delivered?
Thanks for downloading Ding Dong: Condom!\nYou now have access to our free, \non-demand condom delivery service.

This app is for our Computer Science senior project. This year\'s topic is Mobile Health, so we built something relevant to many of us: sex in college. Our goal is to improve sexual health on campus by making condom access easier.
\n\nxo Winnie, Awjin, Daniel

THE PREP 
Register with the provided token. 
You'll get a notification when we open for business.


THE DELIVERY 
	You provide a room number or a lounge. 
	We drop off an envelope of 3 condoms within 15 min.


KEEP IN MIND 
	Limit 1 order per night. 
	We don't store any personally identifiable info, so all requests are anonymous!

\tTo use this service you must provide us with your building name, delivery type, and delivery details via our delivery request form. In response, one of us will drop off an envelope containing 3 condoms to your designated destination within 15 minutes. Condoms will be placed under the specified room number door for Room deliveries and to a designated drop box on your specified floor\'s lounge for Lounge deliveries. \n\tLimit 1 order per night. Please use responsibly.

\tWe built this app for our Computer Science Senior Conference project. This year\'s topic is Mobile Health and we wanted our project to be about something that\'s relevant for most of us - sex in college. We want to research whether or not this service improves access to condoms on campus and individuals\' sexual practices and health.
\n\tThis app works by allowing you to place an order during the hours that the app is open this following week. In order to protect anonymity, we are not asking for or storing any personally identifiable data (eg. phone numbers, emails). We are only collecting data from the orders placed and responses to our day-after surveys.
\n\tThanks for your help! - Winnie, Awjin, Daniel

Thank you very much for using our service! In order to better understand how useful this service was to you and whether it is worth developing further, we would ask you to take a few moments to fill out the below survey. As always, it is completely anonymous and will only be used for evaluation in terms of our research project.\n Thanks again,\nAwjin, Winnie and Daniel
